name: NUS-Crypto-Exchange
description: This is a front end project for nus crypto exchange

scripts.start: npm run installation && npm run rabbitmq && cd api && npm run api && cd .. && cd ui && npm run ui && cd .. && npm run matchingEngine
scripts.matchingEngine: apt-get update && apt install python3-pip && pip install -r ./MatchingEngine/requirements.txt && screen python3 ./MatchingEngine/main.py
scripts.rabbitmqInstallation: apt-get install erlang-nox && apt-get update && apt-get install rabbitmq-server && service rabbitmq-server start && rabbitmq-plugins enable rabbitmq_management
scripts.mongodbInstallation: apt install gnupg && curl -fsSL https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-4.4.asc | apt-key add - && echo "deb [ arch=amd64,arm64 ] https://repo.mongodb.org/apt/ubuntu bionic/mongodb-org/4.4 multiverse" | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/mongodb-org-4.4.list && apt update && apt install mongodb-org && mkdir -p /data/db
scripts.installation: npm run screenInstallation && npm run mongodbInstallation && npm run rabbitmqInstallation
